name: Novant Health, Inc.
description: Novant Health, Inc. is a leading integrated healthcare system based in the United States, focused on providing exceptional medical services and enhancing the health of communities. Founded in 1997, Novant Health operates a network of hospitals, outpatient facilities, and physician practices across North Carolina, Virginia, and Georgia. The organization is committed to delivering personalized, evidence-based care, ensuring that patients receive the highest quality treatment in a compassionate environment. Novant Health is known for its innovative approaches to healthcare, including the use of advanced technology and a focus on preventative care. With a mission to improve the health of communities one person at a time, Novant Health emphasizes a patient-centered philosophy that prioritizes the needs and preferences of individuals. The organization offers a wide range of services, including primary and specialty care, urgent care, surgical services, and rehabilitation. In addition to traditional medical services, Novant Health is deeply invested in community health initiatives, health education, and wellness programs that promote healthy living and disease prevention. The company’s dedication to quality and safety in healthcare has earned it numerous accolades and certifications, making it a trusted provider in the regions it serves.

faq.answer: Novant Health is headquartered in Winston-Salem, North Carolina, USA.
